item.title: Privacy policy
item.description: Last updated May 13, 2020 GENDO Studio has been designed with user privacy as the top priority. We must strike a balance between protecting public health and preserving personal privacy, and GENDO Studio takes a privacy-first approach. The GENDO Studio app is designed to make it as difficult as possible for GENDO Studio or others to link the information you choose to provide to you or your device, and to use this information only to enable exposure notification in the midst of this unprecedented pandemic.
